Requirements¶

For the program to run the following packages and software needs to be installed on the computer. When using the installer these are automatically installed:

Windows programs:

  • Anaconda 5.3.1

Python packges:

  • Xlsxwriter

  • Pyqt

  • Sphinx_rtd_theme

  • Winshell

These python packages can be installed by running the pip install . command from within the main repository folder.
